About Us

Our Vision

We strive to be a global leader in fashion-knit and fashion outerwear by empowering innovation and design to provide total customer satisfaction.

We strive to be a caring and well-managed organization for our business partners ,customers and employees, and a responsible corporate citizen to our society.

Our Mission

We want to... be your pink pill — butterfly you — battle boredom — dress your emotions.

Our Progress

We are building a modern brand. Kidi Workshop is one of the last independent global fashion houses in the world and we exist to produce more than clothes and accessories.

We use our collections, collaborations and catwalk shows as a platform to capture the imagination, promote innovative design and campaign for protecting life on Mother Earth, Gaia.

KIDI.

Office Address: 633 Huynh Van Nghe Street, Bien Hoa City

Email: diosvo@kidi.com
